LocalCommit.summary: The Message that contains the LocalCommit from a Replica.

View.summary: The view in which this LocalCommit is sent.

DigestRequest.summary: The hash digest of the request for which this LocalCommit was sent.

History.summary: The of representing the internal history of the replica that sent this message up to the request represented by the sequence number of the Commit sent by the Client.

Id.summary: The id of the replica that sent this message

Client.summary: The of the Client that sent the original Commit to the replica.

LocalCommitMsg.param: The digest of the request of the Message.
The of representing history this Message.
The id of the replica of this Message.
